\begin{minipage}{13cm}
Magic Lantern is being developed by independent film makers in our spare time and at risk to our beloved cameras. We hope that it saves you time and aggravation on set, and we'd appreciate your support. You can help by \href{http://www.magiclantern.fm/download}{donating via PayPal}, or through equipment donations. You can also \href{mailto:broscutamaker@gmail.com}{contact me (Alex) via email}. Thanks!

\vspace{2mm}
